participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, loves expressing herself through arts and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games. My favorite band is One Direction. When I retire I want to open a bakery. I went to a music festival and expressed myself through dancing and singing. I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and sociable, values friendships and enjoys sharing experiences with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I have a crib in my home gym for when my nieces and nephews come to visit. I am gay but I have not told my parents yet. I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog. I like to grow my own herbs and vegetables in my garden. I can't live without my friends, especially when we go out for pizza together.

content.text: What are your favorite things to do?
I like to go to Comic Con and Express my creativity.
That's fun! I love to go to Comic Con too, it's a great place to be yourself.
I hear you! I love to go out to pizza with my friends, we can't live without each other.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend my day playing with my cats and dog.
I love animals! I have a crib in my home gym for when my nieces and nephews come to visit.
That's so sweet! I hope to open a bakery when I retire, I love to cook and bake.
That sounds like a great idea! I love to grow my own herbs and vegetables in my garden.
That's awesome! I love to be able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.
That's really impressive! I am gay but I haven't told my parents yet.
I'm glad you're able to be yourself at Comic Con. It's really important to be true to yourself.
